titles: A reply to Mr. Tho. Beverley's answer to my reasons against his doctrine of the thousand years middle kingdom, and of the conversion of the Jews by Richard Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
keywords: Beverley, Thomas. --  Thousand years kingdom of Christ in its full Scripture-state.
